t: Acadia acquires Crush, targeting Amazon-first brands to strengthen retail media dominance

t: Acadia Acquires Amazon Accelerator CRUSH | LBBOnline
s: April 9, 2025 - Founded by Matthew Rosenfeld in 2022, CRUSH quickly became a go-to Amazon partner for brands looking to launch or optimise their presence on the world’s everything store, delivering successful outcomes for clients spanning industries and categories.

The agency said the transaction will bolster its retail media and commerce capabilities, particularly brands wanting to leverage the Amazon platform. Crush clients, in turn, will have access to Acadia’s capabilities including customer analytics, social, paid media, SEO and others.
